review: Just perfect for me. Easy and it has a large variety of content available. I am not a gamer so it is all I need. Very pleased with the device.

review: Great choices,reasonable price,the cable monsters de-fanged. No longer bombarded by sports programming. Thanks for letting  us decide what we want. Hooray for the common man.

review: Amazon prime doesn't have as much free content as advertised.  Doesn't stream Hulu very well.Free shipping is limited also.

review: Love the fire tv stick. It's way better than chrome cast. Perfect way to upgrade your tv without having to buy a smart tv.
